basic.description: Course examines the causes and effects of corporate crime, and the challenges of controlling, policing, and sanctioning it. The role of the regulatory agency, the impact of globalization, the rise of transnational corporations, and associated issues of development and power are considered.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Sociology of Corporate Crime

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites      Level 4 & reg in a SOCY Major or Medial Plan and (SOCY274 or [SOCY275 and 276] and (a min grade of C in SOCY210 and 211 and 226 and 227) and (a min GPA of2.6 in SOCY210 and 211 and 226 and 227) and (a min GPA of 2.6 in all SOCY)
